name: Epsilon Down
description:
IMPORTANT: PLAY IN FULLSCREEN, OTHERWISE THE GAME WILL NOT WORK

Fight your way through hordes of enemies, slinging spells, imbuing your weapons with magic, and slowing time itself.

Controls:
WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Attack in the direction you are turning towards

Right Click - Stab

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Slow Motion

C - Third Person

Q/E/R - Spells

1 - Sword Skill

Right now, spells don't do damage, the menu doesn't load for some people and enemies don't have swords (for some reason the build makes them invisible. I have no clue why). These issues will be fixed in version 1.1 along with a few quality-of-life improvements. This will be coming out in a few weeks.
